options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    AVG(throughput), 
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    AVG(throughput), 
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641782149) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641783949)
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY pair

options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    AVG(reverseThroughput), 
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    AVG(reverseThroughput), 
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641782202) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641784002)
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY pair

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    SUM(bytesDelta),
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    pair,
    t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
    SUM(bytesDelta),
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641781593) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641783393)
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    pair,
    t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    SUM(reverseBytesDelta),
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair

WHERE $timeFilter
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    pair,
    t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
    SUM(reverseBytesDelta),
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641781735) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641783535)
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    pair,
    t
ORDER BY t

panels.title: Cumulative Reverse Bytes of Network Policy

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    AVG(throughput),
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    pair,
    t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
    AVG(throughput),
    (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641781944) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641783744)
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    pair,
    t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    AVG(destinationThroughput),
    egressNetworkPolicyName
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter 
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != '' 
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    egressNetworkPolicyName,
    t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
    AVG(destinationThroughput),
    egressNetworkPolicyName
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641781989) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641783789) 
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != '' 
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    egressNetworkPolicyName,
    t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    AVG(reverseDestinationThroughput),
    ingressNetworkPolicyName
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter 
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != '' 
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
    AVG(reverseDestinationThroughput),
    ingressNetworkPolicyName
FROM default.antrea

WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1641782047) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1641783847) 
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != '' 
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'chi-clickhouse%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'coredns-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'ipfix-collector-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'flow-aggregator-%'
AND sourcePodName NOT LIKE 'grafana-%'

GROUP BY
    ingressNetworkPolicyName,
    t
ORDER BY t
